Biography

Recently, I have been offered admission to the ECE Ph.D. program at the University of Toronto for the Fall 2023 term. However, due to visa issues, I am currently in a gap year. During this time, I am actively seeking industrial internships to continue my research work. Prior to that, I obtained my Master’s degree in Computer Science from ShanghaiTech University in 2020 under the supervision of Prof. Ning Cai, and my Bachelor’s degree in Spatial Information and Digital Technology from Xidian University in 2017. I have worked as a research intern at Amazon AI Lab (with Yi Zhu, Zhi Zhang & Mu Li) and Tencent GYLab (with Gang Yu).

Research Interests

  • Deep learning

  • Computer vision

  • Information theory

Education

  • Ph.D., Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering, University of Toronto, begins at Jan. 2024

  • M.S., School of Information Science and Technology, ShanghaiTech University, Sep. 2017 - Jul. 2020

  • B.E., School of Telecommunication Engineering, Xidian University, Sep. 2013 - Jul. 2017
